initialize(address).details: Initializes the contract setting the deployer as the initial owner.

isOwner().details: Returns true if the caller is the current owner.

isPaused().return: True: contract is pausedFalse: contract is not paused

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner.     * > Note: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params._amount: amount of token that is transferred from investor to this bond token issuing contract
params._token: address of token used by investor to buy the bond token

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

checkSupportForToken(address).notice: Checks if a specified token is supported for issuing Verified cash tokens

isPaused().notice: returns whether or not the contract is paused

requestIssue(address,uint256,address).notice: Used by external apps (eg, exchange, wallet) to buy Verified bond token

supportTokens(address,bytes32).notice: Specifies list of supported tokens that can be deposited to issue Verified cash tokens
